languages.text: {n}Данные отлично систематизированы, и схема наглядно отражает действия повстанцев. На первый взгляд в них нет никакой логики, но, проанализировав данные и особенности рельефа, вы замечаете определенную систему, явно указывающую на географическую схему в нападениях.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Данные отлично систематизированы, и схема наглядно отражает действия повстанцев. На первый взгляд в них нет никакой логики, но, проанализировав данные и особенности рельефа, вы замечаете определенную систему, явно указывающую на определенную географическую схему в нападениях.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The data is superbly collated, and the map clearly displays the actions of the rebels. At first glance, there seems to be no logic to their campaign, but after analysing the data and the features of the terrain, you notice a clear system indicating a geographical pattern to their attacks.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Данные отлично систематизированы, и схема наглядно отражает действия повстанцев. На первый взгляд в них нет никакой логики, но, проанализировав данные и особенности рельефа, вы замечаете определенную систему, явно указывающую на географическую схему в нападениях.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The data is superbly collated, and the map clearly displays the actions of the rebels. At first glance, there seems to be no logic to their campaign, but after analyzing the data and the features of the terrain, you notice a clear system indicating a geographical pattern to their attacks.{/n}

{n}The data is superbly collated, and the map clearly displays the actions of the rebels. At first glance, there seems to be no logic to their campaign, but after analyzing the data and the features of the terrain, you notice a clear system indicating a geographical pattern to their attacks.{/n}

{n}The data is superbly collated, and the map clearly displays the actions of the rebels. At first glance, there seems to be no logic to their campaign, but after analyzing the data and the features of the terrain, you notice a clear system indicating a geographical pattern to their attacks.{/n}

{n}The data is superbly collated, and the map clearly displays the actions of the rebels. At first glance, there seems to be no logic to their campaign, but after analysing the data and the features of the terrain, you notice a clear system indicating a geographical pattern to their attacks.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这些数据整理得非常有条理，地图也清楚地反应了叛军的行动。这些袭击乍看之下没有任何逻辑可言，但当你仔细地分析了数据与地形特征之后，你注意到，他们的袭击有着非常明显的地缘性。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The data is superbly collated, and the map clearly displays the actions of the rebels. At first glance, there seems to be no logic to their campaign, but after analysing the data and the features of the terrain, you notice a clear system indicating a geographical pattern to their attacks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这些数据整理得非常有条理，地图也清楚地反应了叛军的行动。这些袭击乍看之下没有任何逻辑可言，但当你仔细地分析了数据与地形特征之后，你注意到，他们的袭击有着非常明显的地缘性。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los datos están recopilados con gran habilidad: el mapa muestra claramente las acciones de los rebeldes. A primera vista, no parece que su campaña siga ninguna lógica, pero, tras analizar los datos y las características del terreno, identificas un claro patrón geográfico en sus ataques.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The data is superbly collated, and the map clearly displays the actions of the rebels. At first glance, there seems to be no logic to their campaign, but after analysing the data and the features of the terrain, you notice a clear system indicating a geographical pattern to their attacks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los datos están recopilados con gran habilidad: el mapa muestra claramente las acciones de los rebeldes. A primera vista, no parece que su campaña siga ninguna lógica, pero, tras analizar los datos y las características del terreno, identificas un claro patrón geográfico en sus ataques.{/n}

languages.text: {n}データはよく照合されており、マップは反乱軍の攻撃をはっきりと示している。一見、反乱軍の作戦にロジックはなさそうに見えるが、データと地形の特徴を解析すると、その攻撃は地理的パターンを踏まえた秩序のあるものだと気づく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The data is superbly collated, and the map clearly displays the actions of the rebels. At first glance, there seems to be no logic to their campaign, but after analysing the data and the features of the terrain, you notice a clear system indicating a geographical pattern to their attacks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}データはよく照合されており、マップは反乱軍の攻撃をはっきりと示している。一見、反乱軍の作戦にロジックはなさそうに見えるが、データと地形の特徴を解析すると、その攻撃は地理的パターンを踏まえた秩序のあるものだと気づく。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Daten sind erstklassig zusammengestellt, und die Karte zeigt die Aktionen der Rebellen genau an. Auf den ersten Blick ist in ihrem Vorgehen keine Logik zu erkennen, doch bei der Analyse der Daten und der Geländeeigenschaften bemerkst du, dass ihren Angriffen ein klares System zugrunde liegt, ein geografisches Muster.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The data is superbly collated, and the map clearly displays the actions of the rebels. At first glance, there seems to be no logic to their campaign, but after analysing the data and the features of the terrain, you notice a clear system indicating a geographical pattern to their attacks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Daten sind erstklassig zusammengestellt, und die Karte zeigt die Aktionen der Rebellen genau an. Auf den ersten Blick ist in ihrem Vorgehen keine Logik zu erkennen, doch bei der Analyse der Daten und der Geländeeigenschaften bemerkst du, dass ihren Angriffen ein klares System zugrunde liegt, ein geografisches Muster.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les données ont été compilées avec un soin remarquable, et les agissements des rebelles sont clairement représentés sur la carte. À première vue, leur campagne ne semble avoir aucune logique, mais après analyse des informations et de l'agencement du terrain, vous remarquez que ces attaques suivent un schéma géographique.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The data is superbly collated, and the map clearly displays the actions of the rebels. At first glance, there seems to be no logic to their campaign, but after analysing the data and the features of the terrain, you notice a clear system indicating a geographical pattern to their attacks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les données ont été compilées avec un soin remarquable, et les agissements des rebelles sont clairement représentés sur la carte. À première vue, leur campagne ne semble avoir aucune logique, mais après analyse des informations et de l'agencement du terrain, vous remarquez que ces attaques suivent un schéma géographique.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Veriler harikulade derlenmiş. Harita, isyancıların eylemlerini açıkça gösteriyor. İlk bakışta saldırıların bir mantığı yok gibi görünse de verileri ve arazi özelliklerini çözümleyince saldırıların coğrafi etmenler göz önüne alınarak yapıldığını fark ediyorsun.{/n}

At first glance, there seems to be no logic to their campaign, but after analysing the data and the features of the terrain, you notice a clear system indicating a geographical pattern to their attacks.{/n}
